ticket.title: Policy engine integration: replace StubPolicyEngine in ToolBroker

in_scope: Replace StubPolicyEngine with apm2-core policy engine in ToolBroker.
Enforce deny-by-default when policy is missing or invalid.
Propagate real policy hash in ToolDecision.
out_of_scope: New policy language or policy rules.

steps: Remove stub allow path and enforce deny-by-default.
Add tests for policy hash and deny behavior.

criteria: StubPolicyEngine is not used in production ToolBroker path.
ToolBroker denies requests when policy is missing/invalid.

notes.security: Policy evaluation must be fail-closed; no stub allow path is acceptable.
notes.general: Enables default-deny policy enforcement for session tool mediation.
